snippet: President François Hollande of France, a Socialist, and his prime minister have ordered downgrades in official luxury that carry symbolism in straitened times.
abstract: President Francois Hollande of France and his prime minister order downgrades in official luxury that carry symbolism in harsh times; officials are ordered to ride by rail and fly coach, and their cars have been diminished in size and in luxury; cost-saving measures are also meant to prepare the French for tougher times ahead.
lead_paragraph: President François Hollande of France, a Socialist, and his prime minister have ordered downgrades in official luxury that carry symbolism in straitened times.

headline.seo: Austerity Reaches the Hollande Government in France
headline.main: Austerity Reaches the Hollande Government in France
